tasks: Neutrinoless double beta decay event reconstruction
results: Average cos θ and T1 values can be reconstructed with a precision of 0.19 and 110 keV, respectively
title: Reconstructing Neutrinoless Double Beta Decay Event Kinematics in a Xenon Gas Detector with Vertex T.pdf
